abstract: JPMorgan Chase said on Thursday it was making modest staff reductions in areas that include structured credit and leveraged finance. The cuts are expected to be less than 10 percent in each.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said on Thursday it was making modest staff reductions in areas that include structured credit and leveraged finance. The cuts are expected to be less than 10 percent in each.

headline.main: J.P. Morgan to Cut Jobs in Fixed Income Unit
